DIY Dental Hygiene Appliance: Create a customizable, at-home dental hygiene appliance that includes a built-in toothbrush, flosser, and mouthwash dispenser. Users can customize the appliance to fit their specific oral needs and receive daily reminders to use it. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

Community Dental Co-ops: Establish community-based dental co-ops where individuals can pool their resources to hire a traveling dentist or purchase a portable dental clinic. This approach would provide affordable dental care while fostering a sense of community. Confidence Score: 0.9/1

Virtual Dental Consultations: Develop a telemedicine platform that connects patients with licensed dentists for virtual consultations. This platform could also include AI-powered dental scanning technology to diagnose and provide treatment recommendations. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

DIY Toothpaste: Create a line of all-natural, non-toxic toothpaste alternatives made from ingredients like baking soda, coconut oil, and essential oils. These toothpastes would be more affordable and safer for the environment than traditional toothpaste. Confidence Score: 0.7/1

Edible Toothpaste: Develop a line of edible toothpaste tablets that dissolve in the mouth, providing a quick and easy way to clean teeth without water. These tablets could be made from natural ingredients like chlorine dioxide and xylitol, and could be more convenient than traditional toothpaste. Confidence Score: 0.8/1
